name: Flipp Advertising Inc.
description: We are tailors of brand experiences, creating intelligent solutions with good people. We team up with our clients to help them put their best face forward and authentically communicate their offering to the world. We believe in prototyping, taking risks, and building meaningful work that surprises and achieves measurable results. Our team is close-knit and collaborative, with an extensive offering of services and a commitment to surpassing client expectations.
